name: Magic Ball Pop
description:
Are you ready for exciting poping match exploration?
Magic Ball Pop can train your brain and solve the color ball challenges. When you feel alone, Magic Ball Pop is always by your side.

Features:
- Completely FREE
- Fascination and super easy gameplay
- 100+ Well-designed classic pop levels
- many free magical props or power-ups
- create stunning chain reactions and get 3-stars
